#summary How to install XMPPJCA
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

== Dependencies ==

Please make sure that you have the following software already installed on your machine.

	* Java 5 (or greater)
	* ANT 1.7 (or greater)
	* GlassFish V2 

== Steps to Follow ==

=== Part 1 - The Resource Adaptor (*.rar) ===

	1. Download this zip file and extract the contents to a local working directory.
  	2. Go to that directory, and create a file called project.properties
  	3. Assuming 'javac' and 'ant' are in your PATH, run the main build file by executing the 
  following command
  	{ ant -f build.xml all } or simply { ant }
  	4. deploy
